document_data.name: Hail of Thorns
document_data.mainbody: '''''Hail of thorns''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[ranger]]s.
document_data.Effects: A caster used this spell with a ranged weapon. After casting, the ammunition from the ranged weapon, such as an arrow, became infused with magical energy by the spell. When launched, a spray of sharp thorns erupted from the missile, which rained down upon a target area.
document_data.Components: This spell required only a [[Verbal component|verbal]] component.
